DOC.detailed_description: Pulse pressure variation ( PPV ) remain good predictor fluid responsiveness OR . However , PPV time-consuming calculate ( manual determination ) , always display monitoring screen reliable visual assessment need additional device display . A new Android application ( Captesia ) automatically calculate PPV utilizing digital photograph arterial waveform monitor . The application determine PPV select peak troughs arterial curve .
